title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 3.9 - Sunday and holiday services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 3.9 - Sunday and holiday services

State Regulations

Payrolls or other vouchers claiming compensation for services
rendered by employee on Sunday or holidays must bear the following certificate
signed by the head of the department or other duly authorized official
thereof: I hereby certify that the services performed on Sundays and
holidays, as charged herein, were necessary and for the best interests of the

State. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
3.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
